Class SudokuBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • SudokuBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Board

    public class SudokuBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Board
    Class that allows creation, modification and access to a Sudoku board. A board's items have a "correct" value, and user's are able to enter both "input" values and "draft" input values. This also provides extra functionality in terms of whether particular cells or the entire board are correctly filled
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    Hayden Smith, Laura Hodges, Jerome Robins, Steven Falconieri
